data.taskTitle: Add tabs to sessions page for filtering session types
on sessions tab add tabs so users can filter/switch between types of sessions
on sessions tab add tabs so users can filter/switch between types of sessions
on sessions tab add tabs so users can filter/switch between types of sessions
on sessions tab add tabs so users can filter/switch between types of sessions

summary: Prepared to implement session type filtering tabs based on @configtabs.svelte pattern
Identified component approach for adding filtering capabilities to sessions view

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Session Type Filtering Tabs Component
suggestedTasks.description: Create a new Svelte component for session type filtering tabs in the Sessions view. Use @configtabs.svelte as a reference design pattern. The component should support switching between different session types like active, completed, failed, etc. Ensure responsive design and clear visual state for selected tab.
suggestedTasks.reason: Direct follow-up to original task of adding session type filtering

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Session Filtering Tabs
suggestedTasks.description: Develop comprehensive unit tests for the new session filtering tabs component. Test scenarios should include tab switching, state management, and correct rendering of different session types. Use Svelte Testing Library for component testing.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability and maintainability of new filtering functionality

patterns: Follow @configtabs.svelte design pattern for tab implementation
gotchas: Ensure consistent state management across session type filters

documentationNeeds: Update user guide to explain new session filtering functionality
